title: New: r00ms – Bittersweet Company
body:
Really dig the production on this new track from LA duo **r00ms**.

Touches of Rhye, How to Dress Well and Blood Orange make up the R&B / soul inspired _Bittersweet Company_, all drawn together by a wondrously tight topline. Check it below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
